text: A determination by the Court under this subchapter that an individual 14 years of age or older is incompetent to refuse commitment shall not be relevant to a determination of the individual's competency with respect to other matters not considered by the Court.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 6-1666.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-137, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1301.02.

DC CODE § 7-1303.13

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Rights of Citizens with Intellectual Disabilities. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Admission, Commitment, Discharge, Transfer, Respite Care. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Effect of determination of incompetency to refuse commitment.
